title: Here’s How to Listen to All the 2026 Golden Globe-Nominated Music
summary: Check out the songs and scores that earned nods on Monday morning.
body: At the 83rd annual Golden Globe Awards , six tracks are nominated for best original song and six composers are up for best original score. Included in the song nods are Miley Cyrus’ “Dream as One,” HUNTR/X’s “Golden” (like the KPop Demon Hunters’ juggernaut, check out all the Globe nominees that topped the Hot 100 for six or more weeks ), Sinners ’ “I Lied to You,” two new cuts from Wicked: For Good , and the Nick Cave/ Bryce Dessner collaboration “Train Dreams” from the film of the same name. Related ‘One Battle After Another,’ ‘The White Lotus’ Lead 2026 Golden Globe Award Nominations: Full List As for the scores, perennial nominees like Alexandre Desplat ( Frankenstein ), Jonny Greenwood ( One Battle After Another ), Ludwig Göransson ( Sinners ) and Hans Zimmer ( F1 ) join first-timers Sirāt ’s Kangding Ray and Hamnet ’s Max Richter for their work. During the 82nd annual awards, Trent Reznor and Atticus Ross’ score for Challengers took home the honors, while Clément Ducol, Camille and Jacques Audiard won for their original song “El Mal” from Emilia Pérez . (Cyrus and one of her “Dream” co-writers Andrew Wyatt were nominated in the song categor…
